Package commands.entityCommands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cat
    Prints the content of a file
    Cd
    Change directory
    Chmod
    Change permisions for an entity
    FileCommand
    Abstract class inherited by commands which operates with files
    Ls
    List the content of directories
    Mkdir
    Mkdir command class to create a new directory at a specific path, or from current directory
    Rm
    Removes an entity from a specific path, or from current directory.
    RmCommand
    Inherited by rm and rmdir
    Rmdir
    Removes a directory from a specific path, or from current directory
    Touch
    Creates an empty file at a specific path, or in the current directory
    WriteToFile
    Write data to a file.
